props.name: days
props.placeholder: The amount of days before your presentations

props.name: hours
props.placeholder: The amount of hours before your presentations (max. 23)

props.name: minutes
props.placeholder: The amount of minutes before your presentations (max. 59)

props.name: until
props.placeholder: A specific date and time until when your presentation will start (format: 2021-08-27T23:25:59.000+02:00)

slots.name: title
slots.placeholder: Display the remaining time until your presentation
